skillTree.localised_description: The dread steeds of Chaos are more than mere horses, but creatures tainted by Daemon blood, said to be gifts from the Dark Gods themselves.

effects.description:
Passive Ability: "Souls for the True Gods", while this Mount is equipped, for Cavalry units
	(all units in army)

Passive Ability: "Souls for the True Gods" for Cavalry units
	(all units in army)

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: The dread carriages of the Ruinous hosts are more than just machines of war; they are symbols of status and power.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: These leonine beasts, with deadly stinging tails, are worthy mounts of a mighty Chaos Lord.

effects.description:
Passive Ability: "In the Name of the Ruinous Powers", while this Mount is equipped, for Chariot, Warhoun, and Manticore units
	(all units in army)

unit_ability.onscreen_name: In the Name of the Ruinous Powers!

effects.description:
Passive Ability: "In the Name of the Ruinous Powers" for Chariot, Warhoun, and Manticore units
	(all units in army)

unit_ability.onscreen_name: In the Name of the Ruinous Powers!

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

skillTree.localised_description: Chaos Dragons are anathema to the noble beasts of Caldor. They are now corrupted creatures ridden by malicious Lords.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

skillTree.localised_description: The dominion of Chaos grows larger each day; soon the whole world will be under its sway.
The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.
This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.
The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Few experiences match the satisfaction of shattering the bones of one's enemies.
The Chaos Gods grant almighty strength to the most fervent among their faithful.
The Warriors of Chaos bear the brunt of every attack with a stoic endurance, unburdened by the fear of pain.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 10% for all Chaos Warrior, Chaos Knights and Chosen units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Kill, crush, destroyâ€”these are the tenets of Chaos!
Pain is a trivial price to pay in assuring the complete annihilation of Order!
The brand of the Ruinous Powers is seared into the skin, a mark of absolute dedication to the cause of corruption.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: You will be a part of this ceremony. Be it as a new worshipper basking in the glory of the Dark Gods or as a sacrifice for them is up to you.

effects.description:
Replenishment: +8% for Infantry and Cavalry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Chaos Lord has very good relations with the Chaos Dwarfs, who provide him with superior weapons and armours in exchange of his prisoners.

effects.description:
Weapon Strength: +5% for Infantry and Cavalry units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +5 for Infantry and Cavalry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Dont forget the Gods when you are sacking defenseless towns, lest they forget you when the cannonballs are flying.
We will never stop, we will never relent, we will never falter until this entire world kneels before the only True Gods.
The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
A Chaos Lord dominates â€“ lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

skillTree.localised_description: The Daemons of Chaos bay for blood, spurred on by a chorus of agonised screams.

skillTree.localised_description: As dark wings take to the skies and Daemon arrows bear down, the enemies of Chaos know their end is near.

skillTree.localised_description: Breaking bones and ending lives, the armies of Chaos strike like an unholy hammer crashing through their enemies' ranks.

skillTree.localised_description: Hulks of pure muscle, held upright by unsullied hatred, can crush a man with a frightening lack of effort.

skillTree.localised_description: Subdue the enemy with savage fire, as flaming projectiles burn a trail across the sky.

skillTree.localised_description: The legions march forth under the Lord's inscrutable gaze, eager to kill for fear of his wrath.

Melee defence: +5 for all Infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 10% for all Infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The worthiest of Chaos' vanguard are blessed with the most elaborate mutations, which also enable them to move faster for longer.

Missile resistance: 10% for all Cavalry, Chariot and Flying units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.localised_description: Mutations awarded by the Chaos Gods to their followers may look horrific to southerners, but such gifts are prized.

skillTree.localised_description: To devastate one's enemies from afar is the key to controlling the battlefield.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

effects.description: Unit Upgrades cost: -5% for all units
Unit Upgrades cost: -10% for all units

skillTree.localised_description: No act of faith can rival reaving the souls of the slain; a dark and twisted offering in honour of the Ruinous Powers.

Increased experience gain: +10% for units when fighting against the Forces of Order
	(Lord's army)

Increased experience gain: +15% for units when fighting against the Forces of Order

skillTree.localised_description: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

skillTree.localised_description: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

skillTree.localised_description: For one fighting with the favour of the Ruinous Powers, glory and riches come naturally.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: Visions cloud the mind, prophesising the arrival of the enemy and uncovering every shadow in which they lurk.

skillTree.localised_description: All will bow before such a harbinger of pure, unbridled Chaos, oozing with the energies of corruption.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The champion is surrounded by crackling flames that burn his enemies whilst leaving his own body untouched.
Fatigue is no issue when one is driven by the darkest rage imaginable.
Those blessed by Chaos see not only what is before them, but also what lurks in shadow, hiding in the periphery.
The champion has been rewarded with a hideous appearance, grotesque enough to wither the hearts of men.

effects.description: Attacks cause "'Orrible Smell!" effect, reducing leadership

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Granted skin as strong as iron plate, there is little that can penetrate the champion's defences.
The champion's skin is covered with a thousand reptilian scales, each as tough as Dragonhide.
Some are blessed by a dark understanding, able to gleam knowledge from every experience.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +25
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A foe may strike fast, but those evolved by Chaos move faster still.
Slaanesh's favoured champions are so attractively captivating that few can find the will to raise a blade against them.

effects.description: Path to Glory: -25% Souls cost to devote to Slaanesh

backgroundSkills.localised_description: These rune-etched collars, imbued with Khorne's loathing for magic, provide protection against the arcane arts.
